summary: TAKATA RECALL -  NHTSA # 16V384 - MY 2010 FORD EDGE WAS RECALLED IN JUNE 2016. AFTER OVER 1 YEAR, THERE IS STILL NO REMEDY OR REPLACEMENT FOR MY PASSENGER AIRBAG. LAST YEAR, I WAS TOLD THE PARTS COULD BE IN BY DECEMBER 2016, AND MY DEALER WOULD CONTACT ME WHEN IT WAS IN. I AM STILL TOLD THAT PARTS HAVE NOT COME IN. THIS IS NOT HANDLING THE MATTER IN A TIMELY MANNER. I DON'T FEEL SAFE DRIVING IT, LET ALONE HAVING PASSENGERS IN MY CAR.
